# Arrays

> Arrays.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var ns = require( '@stdlib/types/array' );
```

#### ns

Typed arrays.

``` javascript
var o = ns;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var ns = require( '@stdlib/types/array' );

console.log( getKeys( ns ) );
```

</section>
